content: maxi cosi blanket by maanel perfect size for a maxi cosi baby car seat yarn debbie bliss ecobaby fairtrade sport /5 ply 100% cotton 136 yards /124 m = 50 grams 4 skeins i used color 15 taupe size 70 cm x 50 cm / 27 5 x 19 5 needles us 5 /3 75 mm abbreviations k = knit p = purl rs and ws = right side and wrong side of the work garter stitch = knit all row instructions cast on 96 sts knit 10 row in garter stitch continue in pattern stitch row 1 rs k7 * k5 p2 * 11 times k12 row 2 ws k7 * p5 k2 * 11 times p5 k7 row 3 rs as row 1 row 4 ws as row 2 row 5 rs as row 1 row 6 ws as row 2 row 7 rs as row 1 row 8 ws knit all sts repeat row 1 - 8 until blanket measures 65-70 cm / 26 - 27 5 inches knit 10 row in garter stitch cast off weave in all ends and block copyright 2011 free pattern
